Title: 1 Project Planning and Setup
Body: Conduct user interviews, define workflows, and set up AWS/Odoo environments.

Title: 1.1 Conduct user interviews with target farms

1.1.4 Summarize findings and extract key requirements
1.2 Map critical workflows and pain points

1.2.2 Identify bottlenecks and regulatory pain points

1.3.2.8 Prototype schema in Odoo development environment

1.3.2.10 Iterate schema based on test results and feedback

3 Inventory and Financial Management Module

3.5.3 Enable export of financial reports for compliance and benchmarking

5.5.2 Implement high-priority fixes and improvements
5.5.3 Prepare for full-scale launch
